description: This file provides utility functions for splitting strings into linked lists, specifically the SplitUtils object with methods to split a string into tokens based on spaces and validate tokens.

classes.name: SplitUtils
classes.description: A Kotlin object providing utility functions to split a string into a LinkedList of tokens and validate tokens.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits the input string into tokens separated by spaces, returning them as a LinkedList.

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds a token to the list if it is valid (non-empty).

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks if a token is valid, i.e., not empty.
